plot: Set in the sunny seaside town of Cannes during its annual film festival, this film follows independent filmmaker Jeremy Weinstein as he goes in search of his hero and namesake, Harvey Weinstein.
title: Looking for Harvey
plot_es: Set in the sunny seaside town of Cannes during its annual film festival, this film follows independent filmmaker Jeremy Weinstein as he goes in search of his hero and namesake, Harvey Weinstein.
plot_en: Set in the sunny seaside town of Cannes during its annual film festival, this film follows independent filmmaker Jeremy Weinstein as he goes in search of his hero and namesake, Harvey Weinstein.
